runs.name: main_generator
runs.task_description: Generate the main class implementation as described by the implementation story and manifest.

runs.name: main_validator
runs.task_description: Validate the main class implementation against the implementation story, manifest, and class generation rules. If issues are found, write a validation report and (optionally) request a rerun of the generator.
